Uses of Class
NationMania.ui.Button

  • Packages that use Button 
    Package Description
    NationMania.ui
    NationMania.ui is incharge of drawing User Interface and Handling user input.

    • Uses of Button in NationMania.ui

      Fields in NationMania.ui declared as Button 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Button SignUp.back
      a button for the user to go back to the login screen/settings screen (depending on isEdit)
      private Button Settings.back 
      private Button HighScore.back
      button for user who dosnt see his name on the top and just cant stand for it
      private Button GameInstructions.back 
      private Button MainMenu.gameInstructions
      a button for a new user to see how to play
      private static Button GameScreen.getContinent
      button to the left of pass, so the user can buy the continent of the nation (displayed like a fact).
      private Button MainMenu.highScore
      a button for the user to checks the high scores
      private static Button GameScreen.hitMe
      ***Nation Mania fun fact!*** the famous "WhatTheFact" button was originaly named "HitMe" the designers felt it was outdated and it was changed by the second beta version.*** button the user can press to reveal the next fact
      private Button LoginMenu.login
      a button for the user to submit and log in
      private Button MainMenu.logOut
      a button for a new user who wants to beat the old user under his own name
      static Button GameScreen.mainMenu
      the other button showen after the game, for if the player is tired and wants to checks the high scores ***looks like home***
      private Button MainMenu.newGame
      a button for the user to get their NationMania on
      private static Button GameScreen.pass
      button on the bottom right corner allowing the user to move to the next nation without guessing ***looks like a plane over a globe***
      private Button MainMenu.quit
      a button for quitters
      private Button LoginMenu.quit
      a button for the user to exit the game
      private static Button GameScreen.quit
      button on top left for cowards and people in a hurry
      private Button MainMenu.settings
      a button for the user to go to the settings screen
      private Button LoginMenu.signUp
      a button for the user to go to the signup screen
      static Button GameScreen.start
      the button the covers the screen after pressing "New Game", allows the user time to prepare before the timer is started ***looks like luggage***
      private Button SignUp.submit
      a button for the user to submit the new account details, register the account with the database and login to start playing
      private static Button GameScreen.submit
      button right bellow nationsGuess where user can submit his answer
      static Button GameScreen.tryAgain
      one of the two buttons showen imediately after the timer finishes.
      static Button Settings.updateAccount 
      private static Button Settings.updateDB
